result: Answer 176) An executive always travels between cities A and B, which are located at different times. The duration of the plane travel between the two cities is 6 hours. He always takes a flight that leaves A at 15h and arrives in town B at 18h (respective local times). One day, when I arrived in city B, I knew that I needed to be back in town A at most until 1 pm the next day (local time A).
